channel.title: [PI] character moonwalks away when trying to attack npc
channel.description:
Well when you attack a npc on the server im trying to edit, what happens is your character keeps moon walking away towards north east.
this does not happen on all npc's but it does on quite a few others?
any1 know why? or what i could be causing this or how i can fix lol?

item.title: [PI] character moonwalks away when trying to attack npc
item.dc:creator: @dgk_all_day1 dgk_all_day
item.description:
@dgk_all_day1 wrote:

Rash:

What source?

oracle, its riddled with problems but im keen to fix, and perfect it

yeah i thought it would be in one of npchandler or combatassist lol
just trying to spot something missing or wrong cant seem to notice what im looking for

Read full topic

@dgk_all_day1 wrote:

emtrescue:

i had this same problem before i forgot what i messed with but i used my backup files redid what i meant to do and it was fixed… i caant remember why but make sure before u push save on java/config file ur editing me a backup

yeah see this source came with this already happening. Do you have any idea what it was you edited when it happened to you?
